description: The type of intracellular structure formed when a plant is infected by rhizobia
The identification code of a plant matrix (mother plant) in a given experiment. Equal codes may not represent the same plant matrix across experiments.
The identification code of a plant in a given experiment. Equal codes may not represent the same plant across experiments.
Time elapsed since the start of an experiment.
The treatement applied to a plant in a given experiment. Equal names may not represent the same type of treament across experiments.
The number of flower buds counted in a plant.
The number of flowers counted in a plant.
The number of flowers oppening in a plant by day.
Time elapsed until the first flowering of a plant.
Time elapsed until the peak flowering of a plant.
The number of leaves counted in a plant.
The number of leaf scars counted in a plant.
Whether a plant had nodules in the root system.
The linear distance between the ground layear and the upper boundary of the plant shoot.
